entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
